content.description: Has a chance of freezing the enemies' time.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Ignores power, speed, amount, and area.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by finding an Orologion (which is dropped from breaking light sources.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 7 with **Silver Ring** level 9 and **Gold Ring** level 9 to make **Infinite Corridor**.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Duration +1 
(3) Cooldown -0.5 
(4)  Duration +1 
(5) Duration +1 
(6) Cooldown -0.5 
(7) Duration +1

content.title: Clock Lancet
